content: Hi, I'm having some issues with my account. I keep getting charged for services I don't use. Can you help me?
Sorry to hear that! Can you please provide us with your account details so we can look into this further?
Okay, my account number is 123456 and I've been a customer for about 2 years now.
Thank you for providing that information! We'll look into the charges on your account. Can you please confirm if you have made any changes to your payment method recently?
Actually, I did change my payment method last month because I was having trouble with the old one.
